Text: I've got a suggestion. A lot of Apple tv users, especially the ones who watch in HD want a Dolby Digital track encoded as well. The handbrake Apple TV setting will include this if it's in the source file.

Same request.
Most of users of iTunes, Apple Tv use to have at least a 5.1 home theater. You making a godd job, i also use HandBrake but i stick with all the audio sources. i'll be thankful if you do that and maybe ad some subs in spanish.
